translation: The topic of my speech today is Slow down and enjoy your life.
transcript: 我今天跟大家讲的题目是《慢下来，我们要学会聆听生活》。

translation: I'd like to share with you some stories before you wonder why I chose this topic.
transcript: 为什么这么说，先听我讲几个故事。

translation: Eight years ago, I switched from the internal medicine to the emergency department.
transcript: 八年前，我从一个内科大夫改行干了急诊。

translation: On that day I was busy in the emergency room.
transcript: 那一天的白天我在抢救室忙碌着。

translation: The paramedics rushed in a little boy while using a resuscitator to pump air into his lungs.
transcript: 120冲着推进来一个小男孩儿。

translation: The boy was wired to an ECG monitor with tracheal cannula inserted into his mouth.
transcript: 绑着心电监护，插着气管插管，捏着皮球。

translation: When I was there to give first aid, the ambulance doctor told me that the child passed out on a bus on his way to school.
transcript: 我在这边急救的时候，120大夫跟我说，小孩儿在上学的路上倒在了公共汽车上。

translation: Fortunately, a retired old doctor at present gave him CPR in time.
transcript: 幸亏边上有一个退休的老大夫当时给他做了心肺复苏。

translation: So when he was sent to our hospital, he still had his last heartbeat, but they could not save him and he died at only 14 years old.
transcript: 所以他送到我们医院的时候还有最后一丝心跳，但是这个孩子最后还是没有救过来，年仅十四岁。

translation: Thereupon it occurred to me that sudden death does not only happen to the elderly, it could happen to such young children.
transcript: 从他身上我知道原来突如其来的猝死不光是发生在老人身上，甚至可以在这么年轻的孩子身上。

translation: The second story I want to tell happened last year.
transcript: 第二件事情发生在去年。

translation: It was also in the emergency room, a place mingled with joys and sorrows.
transcript: 也是在抢救室，抢救室总是悲欢离合嘛。

translation: Still, it was in the day.
transcript: 那天也是一个白天。

translation: This time the ambulance sent here a middle-aged man, who came in with no heart beat or breath.
transcript: 120也是送过来一个中年男子，来的时候心跳呼吸都没有了。

translation: He was a rich man in Erdos.
transcript: 他是一个鄂尔多斯的富翁。

translation: Everyone knows that Erdos is a filthy-rich place, where even cleaners drive Land Rovers to work.
transcript: 大家都知道鄂尔多斯富的流油，连清洁工都是开着路虎去上班的。

translation: Here is the thing.
transcript: 但是呢。

translation: He was in Beijing for business and met his clients for tea in a five-star hotel.
transcript: 他来北京做生意约了客户在五星级酒店喝茶。

translation: While drinking the tea, he was caught by a sudden chest tightness.
transcript: 喝茶的过程当中觉得胸闷不舒服。

translation: On that moment he did not realize that he was having a heart attack, instead, he called the waitress and accused her of using fake tea.
transcript: 他没有马上意识到他心脏病犯了，他把营业员服务员叫过来痛斥了小姐一顿，指责他们这个茶是伪劣产品。

translation: As you could imagine, he got more and more emotional that he fell down on the ground, losing his heartbeat and breath instantly.
transcript: 当然了，越说越生气越说越激动，倒地上了，心跳呼吸当时就没有了。

translation: When the ambulance arrived, they could not save him.
transcript: 120到场的时候抢救根本就无效。

translation: He was then sent to our hospital but we still could not bring him back after emergency treatment.
transcript: 送到我们医院抢救了半天也无效。

translation: I learned a lesson from his experience.
transcript: 从他身上我得到一个结论。

translation: It turns out that groundless accusation against others can cause some serious consequences.
transcript: 原来无端的指责别人可以造成这么恶劣的一个后果。

translation: The third story took place this year, in the emergency room again.
transcript: 第三件事情发生在今年还是在抢救室。

translation: It is indeed a place of stories.
transcript: 抢救室的故事的确特别多。

translation: A city fell in love with a boy from the countryside, but her parents were strongly against their relationship.
transcript: 是一个城里的小女孩，她爱上了一个农村的孩子，但是父母坚决反对，不同意。

translation: Well, I am married to a man from rural areas, and my parents were also strongly against my decision.
transcript: 嗯我嫁的也是个农村孩子，我父母也坚决反对不同意。

translation: Then she drank paraquat in order to show her determination to pursue true love.
transcript: 然后呢就是她为了表明她自己的爱情的坚贞，她喝下了百草枯。

translation: I mentioned in my micro blog that paraquat is a medicine without antidote, and one is doomed to die after drinking it.
transcript: 我在我的微博里提到百草枯这个药没有解药，喝了以后必死无疑。

translation: Even if there could be survivors, the possibility is one in a million.
transcript: 就算侥幸有一例幸存的，那也是万里挑一甚至百万分之一。

translation: She didn't know that what she was drinking was lethal.
transcript: 当时她喝的时候不知道她要死。

translation: As a result, from her admission to our hospital to her death, she was tortured for a whole week.
transcript: 结果从她进我们医院到死亡，前前后后一个星期。

translation: She underwent all kinds of ordeals until finally multiple organ failure took her life.
transcript: 受尽了折磨，最后脏多脏器功能衰竭。

translation: I couldn't bear to look at her eyes, which were all craving for life.
transcript: 我都不忍心去看她那个眼神，是对生的留恋。

translation: She would stare at the door of the emergency room every day.
transcript: 她每天就盯着抢救室的门口。

translation: Her boyfriend from the village did not dare to come, from the moment she was in the emergency room till she passed way, he never showed up.
transcript: 她那个农村男朋友不敢来，从她到急诊到最后死亡，不敢来一步。

translation: It wasn't until she died that her little boyfriend came to her hospital bed and cried.
transcript: 最后她死了，农村的小男友来了，哭在她的病床前面。

translation: But what is the point?
transcript: 可有什么用呢？

translation: So I keep telling my friends that if they want to show their loyalty to love, self-destruction is not an option.
transcript: 所以我也不停地跟我的朋友说，如果你想表示你对爱情的忠贞，靠毁灭自己是成全不了你的爱情的。

translation: Well, let's get back to my topic and explain why would I talk about slow life today.
transcript: 那好我们再把这些话题回过来，为什么我要今天讲慢生活。

translation: Because many people on Weibo have asked me how came I, a PhD graduate, was still a physician after working for 11 years, and whether I felt ashamed of it?
transcript: 因为微博上很多人都问我你一个博士毕业生工作到现在十一年了怎么还是主治丢不丢人？

translation: I tell everyone I never feel ashamed.
transcript: 我告诉大家不丢人。

translation: Why not?
transcript: 为什么呀？

translation: I've thought about it.
transcript: 我想了想。

translation: I don't like to stay in the laboratory all day long, I don't like to be surrounded by groups of mice, I don't like to rip the dog's stomach open to do hemodynamics or whatever.
transcript: 我不喜欢趴在实验室里，我不喜欢埋头在小白鼠当中，我也不喜欢把狗的肚子抛开去做什么血流动力学。

translation: I just like sitting by patients' bedside to see their 24-hour urine volume, even to check out the exact amount of it per hour.
transcript: 我就喜欢蹲在病人床边看他24小时的尿量，甚至精确到每个小时的尿量是多少。

translation: It doesn't matter if this is recognized by social values or not.
transcript: 但是呢社会价值观不认同，没有关系的。

translation: Well, I also thought about writing articles and the types I would write could be about my clinical experience and trivia.
transcript: 嗯我也想过要写文章，写什么样的文章，类似于这样的临床小经验、小知识。

translation: However, I have been working in the emergency department for only eight years, and it is too soon for that.
transcript: 但是我现在在急诊工作八年，时间还短。

translation: I think the accumulation of such clinical experience requires me to work for a longer time, and then I could write a notebook that retails for 0 yuan.
transcript: 我觉得这样的临床经验的积累需要我再工作一段时间，再积累以后写成一个小本子零售价0元。

translation: Any doctor that wants one will get it for free and anyone could bring it home for free copy. I won't claim any copyright.
transcript: 来的大夫谁愿意要免费赠送，谁愿意拿回家随便复印没有版权。

translation: I think this is what I really want to do.
transcript: 我觉得这样对我来说真正的是我自己想做的事情。

translation: After I came to, thank you, to this understanding, our director got worried.
transcript: 我想明白，谢谢大家，我想明白这些以后呢，我们主任犯愁了。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: For being the only senior female PhD in the emergency department and eloquent at the same time, I did not participate in the application of research projects or apply for experimental funds with hospital leaders.
transcript: 急诊科难得的一个这么老的一个女博士生，而且这么能说会道的，竟然不参与课题的申请了，不去医院里面跟院领导申请要实验经费了。

translation: My leader was anxious and decided to send me to the United States to receive capitalist re-education.
transcript: 领导急了，于是决定把我派到美国去，接受资本主义的再教育。

translation: But they made a mistake.
transcript: 但是他们失策了。

translation: I went there happily and came back even happier.
transcript: 我去了，高高兴兴的去了，甚至特别高兴的回来了。

translation: After I came back, I briefed the department on the advantages of capitalist medical system that I had observed during the past one year or so in the United States.
transcript: 回来以后我在我们科作报告，我说我去美国大半年不到一年的时间，然后发现了资本主义的医疗体系真是好啊。

translation: It allows you to engage in clinical practice without having to do any laboratory experiments.
transcript: 它完全可以只干临床不去搞实验。

translation: There will also be special funding if you want to do laboratory experiments and clinical practice at the same time.
transcript: 当然他们也特别地资助你去搞实验也干临床。

translation: But these are completely two separate system.
transcript: 完全是两个体系。

translation: The second point I want to talk about is what is "success" for us.
transcript: 第二点是我想说的，我们什么叫成功。

translation: Few Chinese people agree that the happiness of their family is success.
transcript: 中国人很少很少会认同家庭的幸福就是成功。

translation: When I first arrived in Washington D.C., I worked in a co-building institution with our hospital so there were personnel interchange between the two hospitals.
transcript: 但是我在华盛顿的时候我刚去，我因为我们跟那个医院是共建共建单位，他们也派人来我们也派人去。

translation: At first, I needed to make friends with my colleagues, as I was kinda "on assignment" there, just like those special female agents who were asked to socialize in the past.
transcript: 我去的时候为了拉拢关系嘛，领导交给我的那个你知道很多女特务过去都是需要搞援交的。

translation: I brought with me a sum of funds granted by my superiors, I would invite people to have dinner or go to the pub with me after work and i offered to pay.
transcript: 于是我带了一笔公款，我说诶我请你们大家去吃饭啊，今天下了班以后去PUB呀，去干嘛都可以啊。

translation: But one one would come.
transcript: 但是没有一个人跟我去的。

translation: At first I thought maybe it was about race, since I'm asian.
transcript: 一开始我认为哎呀是不是因为种族歧视，我是黄种人。

translation: In the end, a Chinese American told me, "Yu Ying, you don't have to invite them for dinner. You don't have to. They go home to be together with their wife, children and lover. You don't need to waste your money. Just come to work."
transcript: 但最后有一个华裔跟我说，说于莺啊你不要请他们吃饭了，没有用的，他们回家都是陪老婆、陪孩子、陪情人，你不要请他们浪费钱，正常上班就可以了。

translation: Yet when they were in China, our department invited them to eat Peking duck and BBQ, BBQ as in the street food.
transcript: 等他们来到中国，我们科去请他们吃北京烤鸭，去吃BBQ，BBQ就是街边的烧烤。

translation: They gladly accepted.
transcript: 他们欣然接受。

translation: Then I knew what it means to do as the Romans do.
transcript: 所以我就知道什么是入乡随俗。

translation: When I was in Washington D.C., I lived in a Chinese family.
transcript: 我在华盛顿的时候住在一个华人的家庭。

translation: Surrounded by Americans, I felt unhappy about not having enough opportunity to practice English.
transcript: 周围全是美国人，哎呀非常痛苦，没有地方去练英语。

translation: One day when it was snowing heavily outside, a real heavy snow, I was by the windowsill, trying to take some poetic selfies.
transcript: 有一天外面下着鹅毛大雪，雪非常非常得大，我趴在窗台前面，装文艺青年玩自拍。

translation: At this time, I found that all my neighbors came out to shovel snow.
transcript: 这个时候呢就发现邻居全出来铲雪了。

translation: There were bulldozers, brooms and shovels.
transcript: 有推土机，有扫把，有铲子。

translation: Oh, they were bustling and chatting happily.
transcript: 哎呦特别热闹，聊得特别开心。

translation: So I went to the basement, took a shovel, and rushed out to work with them together.
transcript: 于是我就去地下室也拿了一把铲子我就冲出去了。

translation: There I was shoveling, shoveling and shoveling, before I became familiar with them.
transcript: 在那铲啊铲啊铲啊铲，混熟了。

translation: After getting acquainted with my neighbors, I knew that there was a old couple nextdoor and they had no children around.
transcript: 混熟以后呢，我就知道隔壁是老两口，没有孩子，孩子在外面已经分开了。

translation: They had been building a terrace for a whole summer and a winter, but they still had not finished.
transcript: 他们搭一个露台，搭了整整的一个夏天连一个冬天还没有搭完。

translation: Down the road of my neighborhood, there was a family, with a neatly-trimmed lawn and lots of Chinese roses resting on it.
transcript: 来在路口，有一家人特别好，草坪修得特别的整齐，上面种了一坨一坨的月季花。

translation: Every time when I went pass by, I saw the beautiful Chinese roses with stings.
transcript: 每次我去的时候一看，哎呀月季花好美可是有刺儿啊。

translation: As I reckoned, it must be a family of wealth or privilege.
transcript: 然后我想按我的思维惯式非富即贵。

translation: Yeah, they must be lawyers or some middle-class IT guys, just like our IT boy here with cloud computing.
transcript: 对吧，要不然就是律师，要不然呢可能就是一些中产阶级搞IT的，像刚才那位IT男一样云计算嘛。

translation: But one day at noon I skipped work and went home.
transcript: 但是有一天中午我翘课了翘班了回家。

translation: I found a yellow school bus parked in front of their house.
transcript: 我发现他们家门口停了一辆黄色的校车。

translation: It turned out that the man of the family was a bus driver and his wife was a housewife with two children.
transcript: 原来男的是校车司机，女的是家庭妇女带着两个孩子。

translation: They lived a very happy life and I envied them so much.
transcript: 过的非常开心的生活，看的我直眼热。

translation: Because their house, with those snow-white railings and green lawns, completely fitted every detail of my bourgeois imagination.
transcript: 因为他们那个房子，雪白的栏杆，绿翠绿的草坪，完全符合我小资的每一个生活细节。

translation: After I returned from the United States, I began to wonder if I was asking too much of myself, so I lowered my requirements even further.
transcript: 从美国回来以后，我就开始想，我是不是对自己要求太高了，于是呢我就更加的降低了对自己的要求。

translation: Then my happiness index skyrocketed.
transcript: 幸福指数直线上升。

translation: I felt just so pleased that smiles never came down from my face.
transcript: 太美了，每天都笑呵呵的。

translation: So now the patients will see me and say, "Doctor, you look so happy".
transcript: 所以现在病人看到我说，大夫你真喜兴。

translation: Well, is there any reason not to?
transcript: 我能不喜兴吗？

translation: After all, I am rich and gorgeous, right?
transcript: 白富美啊，对吧？

translation: Then I began to savor every detail of life.
transcript: 然后我就开始体会生活中的每一个细节。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: Because I have been a doctor for so many years and have been in the emergency department for eight years.
transcript: 因为我当医生这么多年，在急诊科待了八年。

translation: I have seen too much bereavements.
transcript: 见多了生死离别。

translation: Especially when I had a extremely day and four patients passed away on my shift on one day.
transcript: 尤其是当我命运特别悲催的时候，我值一天的班送走四个患者。

translation: At that time, the nurse called me "Three for the Day and One for the Night".
transcript: 那个时候护士给我一个绰号叫白三夜一。

translation: There was really nothing to do about it.
transcript: 真是没有办法。

translation: It was doomed.
transcript: 命倒命倒霉催的。

translation: But at that time, I found that I seemed a bit indifferent to the scenes when the family of patients cried for their death.
transcript: 但是那个时候我就会发现，当病人去世的时候，家属嚎啕大哭，我似乎很冷血我没有什么太多的感触。

translation: The urge to cry with patients' family and the anxiety I got when I first witnessed the death of my patients, they have been long gone for me.
transcript: 年轻的时候当大夫，在手上刚去世一两个病人的时候那种紧张，那种想跟着他一起哭的心情早已经没有了。

translation: However, I'm often touched by some small details.
transcript: 但是呢会常常为一些小的事情去感动。

translation: For example, around last year, there came a young couple.
transcript: 比如说前一阵子大概是去年的时候，来了一对年轻的夫妻。

translation: The woman had a persistent fever for unknown reasons.
transcript: 女的持续地发烧，原因不明。

translation: We highly suspected a lymphoma from the clinical experience and had a lymph node biopsy.
transcript: 我们临床高度怀疑是一个淋巴瘤，做了淋巴结活检。

translation: The pathological type of her lymphoma was especially difficult to diagnose.
transcript: 她的淋巴瘤病理类型特别难以诊断。

translation: A lymph node biopsy requires ordinary routine staining, immunohistochemistry and gene rearrangement.
transcript: 一个淋巴结活检需要做普通的常规染色，需要做免疫组化，需要做基因重排。

translation: The whole procedure took three weeks.
transcript: 整个程序下来，三周过去了。

translation: It turned out to be reactive hyperplasia, which meant there was no lymphoma.
transcript: 结果是反应性增生，等于没有。

translation: Well, then we did lymph node biopsy again.
transcript: 那好，再做淋巴结活检。

translation: We made three times altogether and she had been hospitalized for two and a half months.
transcript: 前后一共做了三次，她在我们这边留了两个半月。

translation: The woman turned desperate and cried in bed every day.
transcript: 女的都已经绝望了，每天躺床上哭。

translation: The man was still calm and tried to cheer her up as usual.
transcript: 男的依旧的很平静，一如既往的去哄她开心。

translation: Every day when her fever cooled a bit, he would wheeled her outside to stroll for a while.
transcript: 每天她稍微不发烧的时候，推她稍微外面溜达溜达。

translation: He carried a stainless steel lunch box to buy her whatever he could afford, trying to make her eat.
transcript: 拿着一个不锈钢的饭盆满大街的给她买他能买得起的，变着花样的饭给她吃。

translation: I go to work very early every morning, a habit developed during my study at Peking Union Medical College.
transcript: 我每天早上上班特别得早，因为多年的协和医大毕业生养成的习惯。

translation: I will be there at the hospital before 7 o'clock every day.
transcript: 我每天七点钟之前就已经到医院了。

translation: Every morning I would see him wondering around with his lunch box, happily humming a melody.
transcript: 每天早上我能看到他端个饭盆，高高兴兴哼着小曲过去。

translation: He would give me a shy smile and say hello.
transcript: 看到我特别腼腆地笑了一声，说于大夫早。

translation: For the last pathological analysis, we have the samples sent to two hospitals, one of which had the chromosome test result that diagnosed it as a T-cell lymphoma.
transcript: 最后一次病理，我们送了两家医院，有一家医院染色出来了，是一个T细胞淋巴瘤。

translation: Later the hematology department said she was hospitalized for chemotherapy.
transcript: 血液科说她住院打化疗了。

translation: The last time I saw him was in the emergency, they were strolling around hand in hand.
transcript: 我最后一次见他是在急诊，他拉他老婆的手在溜达。

translation: Seeing me, the young man greeted me with a shy smile and his wife also showed a rare smile.
transcript: 看到我小伙子还是腼腆地笑了一下，他的媳妇儿也露出了难得的笑容。

translation: At that moment, my nose felt sour, really.
transcript: 我觉得那一刻真的，我的鼻子都酸了，真的。

translation: I just thought love like this was really rare.
transcript: 我就觉得像这样的爱情真是太难得了。

translation: Because the love that we can stick to in difficulties and poverty is especially precious.
transcript: 因为我们在困难中，在贫穷中还能坚守的爱情其实是特别特别难得的。

translation: Then let me come back to our topic.
transcript: 那我再说回来。

translation: My favorite American TV series is not ER, although I am an ER.
transcript: 我特别喜欢的一个美剧不是ER，虽然我是一个ER。

translation: Actually I like Doctor House.
transcript: 我喜欢的美剧是《Doctor House 》。

translation: Why do I like it?
transcript: House医生，为什么喜欢它？

translation: I especially admire the writer, who could make up every extremely unreliable story so reliable.
transcript: 我特别喜欢它的编剧，能把每一个特别不靠谱的故事编得这么靠谱。

translation: But don't believe any of the medical scenarios in it.
transcript: 里面所有的医学桥段大家不要信。

translation: None of them are reliable.
transcript: 没一个是靠谱的。

translation: All diagnostic and experimental treatments in there will be first-degree murders in real life.
transcript: 所有的诊断性治疗、实验性治疗在我们这边就是一级谋杀。

translation: But it portrays a Doctor House through one plot after another.
transcript: 但是它就通过一个一个剧情刻画了一个House医生。

translation: He's crippled, third-class crippled.
transcript: 他瘸腿三等残废。

translation: He is an alcoholic and he uses drugs, he is a junkie.
transcript: 他嗜酒如命，他嗑药，属于我们这边的瘾君子。

translation: Nonetheless, we can see that what the writer tries to build is a doctor with a delicate heart and who shows his kindness in a unique way.
transcript: 但是它的编剧编出来的戏，我们能看到他有与众不同的善良和一颗细腻的内心。

translation: Here is a scene of Dr. House that draws my attention: Each time when he solves a difficult case, he will go out, there are snowflakes floating in the sky, falling on his face.
transcript: 我注重的House医生的这个片段是当他每解决一个疑难病例的时候，他走出去了，天上飘着雪花，落在他的脸上。

translation: Then background music starts and he will have a happy smile.
transcript: 背景音乐响起，他那一丝欣慰的笑容。

translation: Another one is when the patient's condition is eased, the family members and the patient weep with joy and hug each other.
transcript: 还有就是当患者的病情缓解了，家属和患者喜极而泣拥抱在一起。

translation: He will walk past the room and look inside, then an imperceptible smile turns up on his face, he then leaves with a snicker.
transcript: 他从病房门口走过，回头看了一下，嘴角轻轻地一笑，一个坏笑走了。

translation: Those are the scenes that move me, for I believe that there are the true, the good and the beautiful in every corner of life.
transcript: 真正感动我的是这种的片段，我觉得真是生活中无处不在真善美。

translation: We just need a pair of beauty-seeking eyes.
transcript: 只是需要一个发现的眼睛。

translation: Then why can I live so happily every day now?
transcript: 那好，为什么我现在能够那么开心的活着每一天？

translation: You see, Peking Union Medical College Hospital and my own leaders once required me to shut down my Weibo.
transcript: 你知道协和医院这样的单位包括领导曾经要求我停微博。

translation: Now the hospital's Party Committee Office is also watching my Weibo every day.
transcript: 包括现在党办每天都在监控着我的微博。

translation: I think my political treatment is just like that of political prisoners, and I am extremely happy.
transcript: 我觉得我的政治待遇简直是跟政治犯一样，特别地开心。

translation: Ha ha, I went to the west gate yesterday to pick up a package.
transcript: 呵呵，我我昨天上西门去拿一个包裹。

translation: It was from one of my fans whom I don't know.
transcript: 是我一个粉丝我也不认识她。

translation: She sent me her handmade cookies.
transcript: 她从她手工做的饼干给我寄过来了。

translation: I was humming a ditty all the way and going forward with the cookies.
transcript: 我一路哼着小曲端着那个饼干我就过去了。

translation: At this time, I saw the director of our hospital's Party Committee Office coming over.
transcript: 这个时候看到我们党办主任从那这么过来了。

translation: Seeing her, I said hello.
transcript: 看到我，我说嗨你好。

translation: She gave me a glower and then ignored me.
transcript: 瞪了我一眼不理我。

translation: Alright, it doesn't matter.
transcript: 不理就不理吧。

translation: I've tried my best, haven’t I?
transcript: 无所谓仁至义尽就行了嘛，对吧？

translation: Therefore, I think someone like me that is shameless, haha, broad-minded and super flexible, that does not give a shit about what people think of him or her, when they live in a society with all kinds of issues, with so much pressure and with such fierce competition, I think I'm doing not bad.
transcript: 所以像我这样没脸没皮的，呵呵，然后心胸特别开阔的，自我调整能力超强的，也不在乎外界的眼光的一个人，在这么一个恶劣的社会下，在这一个生存压力如此大的一个社会下，在优胜劣汰如此强烈的一个社会下，我觉得我还是一个杰出的代表人物。

translation: Therefore, I hope that all of you here, after listening to my long speech today, will live out your true selves.
transcript: 所以呢我希望在座的各位，今天听完我唠叨，也活出你们自己的真我。

translation: Right, don't worry so much, don't care about other people think of you.
transcript: 对吧，不要管那么多，不要管别人的眼光。

translation: What's wrong with being a little plump?
transcript: 胖一点怎么啦？

translation: Adele was far bigger than me wearing that dress when she sang in Royal Albert Hall.
transcript: Adele在Royal Albert Hall里面唱那个歌，她穿的衣服远远比我胖。

translation: So I think there is nothing wrong for us to live out ourselves, and we will find our own place in an all-inclusive society.
transcript: 所以我觉得没有什么，每个人就活出你的自我，这个社会就会五彩斑斓。

translation: That will be nice.
transcript: 挺好的。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
